attributes.action: Ask Boris Johnson to remain in the EU Single Market beyond 31 December 2020
attributes.additional_details: Just ask boris to stay in the single market for 1 or more years. The Uk is out of the EU and our priority is to make it a success working all together but we need to do it with wisely.
attributes.background: We need to stay in the eu single market at list for 1 year or more in order to reduce uncertainty. The UK economy has been affected badly by the COVIT PANDEMIC and it will be worse if don't act responsibly. Many people have lost there jobs and the government schemes will be not able to stand longer.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend the transitional phase of Brexit by one year, to 31.12.21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303686

In Brexit talks negotiate for continued EU single market membership for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319241
